'''''The Calendar of the Future Is Longer Than the Diary of the Past''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must read all six [[Cipher Letters]] found in the [[Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region]], [[Fontaine]].
